IX.ii.2.B.7.a
.
Effective Date of a Veterans Pension Award
In general, for claims received after September 30, 1984, the effective date of a Veterans Pension award is the date the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) received the claim, see
38 CFR 3.400(b)
.
